text:
Yaar itni saari memories hai apni saathi me ki kya bataayein! The night-time walks, Canteen me chole-kulche, tere room pe timepass, morning snack at MT, the chats about our "realizations" and much more...
It's strange how we find such great friends in people we didn't expect to.
Thanks for always being there to listen to me  especially when I would come to you to rant about the shit in elections.
Keep up with your conviction for self-improvement; it's inspiring.
Whenever you read this and want to talk and rant about life...just give me a call!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
TA ho ya Abhishek Chaudhary ka project:
Prof or Guide : Bahut hi bakchod project banayenge hum
Aditya : Hao.
Aditya (after some time) : Humko bas project khatam karna hai!

Lekin jo bhi kaho...TA ka project tha bakchod!

Abhishek Chaudhary ka project bhi kya chutiyaap tha; 2 mahine bas Data collect kiya aur Sir ko gyaan pelte hue suna. 
Hum dono : Sir, kuch remote areas ka data to nahi mil raha.
Prof : data nahi mil raha to tum dono ko wahan bhej denge, data lete aana...

Had some great memories with you...especially tere solemn-faced jokes.
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Oye Bandar...Darwaza khol! KHOL!
Tere room par kitni bakchodi ki hai...

Kitni saari yaadein hai apni; Bithoor ki wo cycle trip, Delhi ki wo roadtrip, Parathe waali gali aur Gurudware me humne itna khaa kaise liya!
UP Singh ke saath dinner pe us conversation me to alag hi maze aaye the!

Apne late night assignments were a different memory altogether! Har baar discuss karne pe hum dono me se kisi ka kuch na kuch galat nikal hi jaata tha! 

Duniya-jahaan ko gaaliyaan dete hue mujhe sunne ke liye Thanks (although most of the time tere paas koi option tha bhi nahi)
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Thanks for introducing me to good music, especially Coke Studio. I'll miss the times when we would sing together on the terrace above B6. Thanks for bearing with my terrible singing! 
I do recall another funny incident from our Sociology class when I slept through most of the lecture, sitting beside you in second row, with my mouth wide open!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Yo Saini!

At Kanpur Railway station, I checked the hall allocation list, my roommate's name was Abhishek Saini....Hmmm... Cool, milte hai isse!

Because of my own narcissism (Sorry for that), we started off with a communication gap and it prevailed for a long time... Dil bahut halka ho gaya tha when I finally apologized to you for not being a good roommate!

Dil ke bahut acche bande ho tum.

Yaad hai jab light chali gayi thi aur hum A5 me laundon ko daraane gaye the (mai white bedsheet odhkar bhoot bana tha) aur ek senior nikal ke aa gaya tha ek room se..."Y17 ho?....chalo nikalo"
...jo bhi ho, A5 waalon ki phat to gayi thi.

B6 ki roof pe kitni saari memories hai... Baarish ke baad ka sunset dekhna, Nitik aur wingies ke saath horror storytelling and some random bakchodi.

Blue world ki kahani bhi alag hi hai... especially IIT Gate pe mera first time beer try karna (yaar koi acchi beer suggest karte...Kingfisher bhi koi suggestion hai). Kitna darte hue pi thi maine, ki campus pahunchne tak bhand na ho jaaun; aur wo thi bhi itni zyada (lekin bhand phir bhi nahi hua)
and then the walk back to Hall (wo bhi seedhe seedhe nahi kiya gaya hum logon se). 

And remember the freshers' treasure hunt? Bas final destination par pahunch gaye, wahi badi baat thi! Also, Odyssey ka treasure hunt bhi kitna mazedaar tha, diwaar se clue waala paper hi phaad diya tha humne ;).

Aisi hi kitni saari yaadein hai tere saath; big and small, bitter and sweet!

Cheers to all the memories together.
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
BOSS! Darwaaza kholo be!
Kitna zyada timepass kiya hai yaar tere room pe. Kahin jaa rahe ho, ya kahin se aa rahe ho; kabhi bhi tumhare room me ghus jao.

Kitni saari yaadein hai yaar apni...wing, antaragni, techkriti ke spaghetti bridge competition se lekar 5km run, Cycling trips, evening exercise and much more...

Kisi bhi cheez ke baare me baat karni ho...you were always there! Thanks, har baar meri bakwaas sunne ke liye!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Hey! 

Remember first year me tumhari skirt me wo photo...us entry ko accept karwaane ke liye bhi mehnat karni padi thi (All seniors were like : Abe ye to skirt lag hi nahi rahi)

Sorry to disappoint you everytime jab tum poochne aate the ki assignment hua ki nahi...aur mera reply hamesha yahi rehta tha ki nahi hua (itni jaldi kaun assignment karta hai yaar!)

Had some great memories with you; GI lab ki lambi conversations, CC Canteen ke dhokle and our video calls! Apni conversations ki range ki koi limit nahi hai!

I'm always up for a video call... whenever you read this...just give me a call!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Oye Atul, nahane nahi naa jaa rahe ho?...
Baalti deta hoo thode der me.

First year me kya Aafat lund tha re tu....but ab bahut better ho gaya hai!
GH me campaigning waala incident yaad hai?...tumhe pata chala ki GH me jaane ke liye ID card lagega, aur tum ID card laaye nahi the...kitna gussa hokar tum chale gaye the wahan se!

Antaragni me thakne ke baad bhi naachte rehna,  chupke se tumko uthakar upar uchalna, wing me bakchodi, midnight volleyball aur na jaane kya kya yaadein hai tere saath ki

Aur haan...baalti mere room se le lena!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Teri adaa hi kuch aur hai... especially teri wo chaal!
Profs aur courses ki bitching karna koi tumse seekhe! 
Tere saath kuch bahut hi acchi yaadein hain; Astroclub,Takneek, TA ki lab (kya bakchod project bana tha apna), Hall me bakaiti, BBQ nation ka spontaneous plan (mess ka khana accha nahi bana hai...chalo BBQ nation chalte hain)
Respect your dedication towards SPO. Yaad hai jab mujhse kisi ne poocha tha ki kya mai OPC banne me interested hoon, to teri kaise phatt gayi thi!
Bua is Love!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Alag hi mast launde ho yaar tum! 
Had some great memories with you.
Bua is love.
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Cheers to the great memories!
From ESC201 Lab to the cycle trip to Ganga Barrage; From non-stop dancing in Antaragni to the late nights before exams!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
You're probably the most trustworthy and reliable person I've known on campus! 
Thanks for always being there for me!
Itna saari memories hai apni; Wing, Antaragni, MT, Blue World aur na jaane kya kya.
Lekin sabse yaadgar memory rahegi wo Antaragni me cycle ke confusion waali. Maine cycle borrow ki, phir chodh aaya, phir tum utha laaye, phir mai kisi aur ki utha laaya; itna zyada confusion tha. Details theek se yaad nahi; isiliye bola tha isko likh lete hai kahin. Ab lag raha hai ki likh hi lena chahiye tha.
Apne banaye hue khane ki pictures bhejte rehna!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text: Hall 3 ke saamne chaat khaane chaloge?
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Hey Random Banarasi!
I went a long way from being intimidated by you to liking you!

Bithoor waali apni wo trip meri sabse spontaneous trip thi....Bithoor se Cockpit Cafe and wahan se movie dekhne... 

Had so many great memories with you; from the late night interrogations and soapboxes to the polling day, tumhaare room pe life me pehli baar bhand hone se lekar EC ki treat (I know I don't sing so well) and much more...
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Thanks for introducing me to some good poetry!
Saaye-me-dhoop padhni shuru ki thi but poori nahi ki... hopefully kabhi phirse koi kitaab uthayenge!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Thanks for being an honest friend before everything else...
Tumhare honest criticism ki wajah se I started to change myself into a better person!

Hall me kiye gaye tumhaare kaam aur cheezo ke betterment ke liye tumhare efforts ke baare me bataate hue tumhe sunna hamesha hi inspiring tha... It's hard to find people who actually work hard to bring a change in their surroundings! 

Kuch kuch maukon par hum dono kuch cheezon pe agree nahi kiye honge...but thanks for respecting my opinion, subtly and quietly...

Cheers to all the big or small memories together!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
We had some good memories together...
Astro club ka apna wo Star evolution waala lecture yaad hain? 
Yaar...beeche me log jab uth uth kar jaane lagte hain to accha to nahi lagta hai yaar! Saath me jhela hai humne ye dukh! 
Ab jab presentation dekhta hoon to lagta hai ki Gangs of Wasseypur ke references sach me thode zyada ho gaye the!

Jab tum coordi the, tab Takneek me telescope round se pehle tumhe baar baar ungli karne me alag hi mazaa tha
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
When I asked you ki RBI Policy Challenge karoge, tab ye expect nahi kiya tha ki hum aage chalkar itne acche dost ban jaayenge !
We grew together in all these years; IWIS, Elections, UPSC and much more...
Thanks for bringing me to EC and standing by me at every step of my journey in EC. 
Polling day se pehle ki wo raat hamesha yaad rahegi. Bahut kuch dekha aur seekha bas us ek raat me! 
Thanks for guiding me in my preparation, Guruji!
Itni saari memories hai apni; bulla kaatna, tense moments in EC, uncertain moments, late night walks se lekar late night interrogation, happy moments, moments of relief, classes me bakchodi, parties aur na jaane kya kya! 
Tumhari wajah se is safar me char-chand lag gaye!
Meet you in Mussorie!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
In Senate Hall...
Chair : Please check if Rupam has been contacted...
Me (turns to the chair) : All the managers have unanimously decided that I shall be the next CEO.
Chair : üòê
Me : üò∂
...
Everyone : üòÇüòÇüòÇ
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Jab bhi tera birthday ho! 
Us raat ko yaad karna
Hasna, muskurana
Lekin yaad rakhna...kitne bhi trousers ya kachche pehen lo...bachoge nahi (Thoda khauf bhi hona chahiye)
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
On the first day of conditioning, bina ruke kuch rounds bhi poore nahi kar paa rahe the hum...
And 40 days later...we were on the train for our first trek!
It was such a great motivation to have you along all the time.
5k, 8k, 10k runs...the rigorous conditioning...the trek which felt longer than it was. But when we finally reached the pass and saw those shiny silvery snow covered peaks...it was all worth it!
We did it... together!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
First year me to tum hum bhaiyon aur wingies ko chodhkar seniors ke saath nikal liye...
But it was good to have you back in the wing in the following years!
I remember our conversation at your room jo ki kabhi bhi kisi random topic kar ho jaati thi...kabhi kabhi lagta tha ki bahut sahi baat bol raha hai ye...aur kabhi kabhi lagta tha ki kya chutiya hai!

Alarm se hi uth jaane ki aadat daal le...har bar mai to nahi rahunga na saamne waale room me
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Hall 5 me midtern election ka polling day yaad hai ? 
Tumlog "kuch nahi kar rahe the"! 
Mai bechara bas ghoom raha tha poore hall me ki koi proof mil jaaye! 

Tumhara kuch bhi narrate karne ka andaaz hi alag hai; jis maasumiyat ke saath tum kuch bhi batate ho!

Your ingenuity has always been inspiring!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Remember the first time we met? 
I was contesting for Senator and I didn't know any girl to get us into GH for campaigning. Luckily, Saransh had a girlfriend. Thanks for agreeing to let us into GH. I remember mere campaigners kitne excited the first time GH me jaane je liye and Atul kitna gussa hua tha jab use pata chala ki ID card ke bina GH me nahi jaa sakte.

Tumhari lab reports ke liye thanks yaar! Khudse lab report likhne ka motivation kahan se aata tha tumhare andar?

GI lab to altogether ek alag hi experience tha! Itni exhausting lab me bhi tum log ki wajah se itna interesting time beeta; itni saari baatein and snacks from CC canteen. 

The long conversations on the video calls were such a great memory!

Whenever you read this... let's get together for another video call
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Remember the first time we met? 
I was contesting for Senator and I didn't know any girl to get us into GH for campaigning. Thanks for agreeing to help us get in. I remember mere campaigners kitne excited the first time GH me jaane ke liye and Atul kitna gussa hua tha jab use pata chala ki ID card ke bina nahi jaata sakte GH me.

Tumhari lab reports ke liye thanks yaar! Khudse lab report likhne ka motivation kahan se aata tha tumhare andar?

GI lab to altogether ek alag hi experience tha! Itni exhausting lab me bhi tum log ki wajah se itna interesting time beeta; the wide range conversations and snacks from CC canteen. 

The long conversations on the video calls were such a great memory!

Whenever you read this... let's get together for another video call
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Bada hi sweet launda hai re tu!
Tumse kahin bhi milkar bahut accha lagta hai...
Mere PJs sunte rehne ke liye shukriya!
Policy conclave ka wo competition yaad hai? Tumhari team jeet gayi thi usme ( ab kisi bhi velle prof ko uthakar judge bana denge to kya hoga. XD)
Soil Mechanics ki class me same row me baith ke bakchodi karne ka apna mazaa tha (padhta to koi waise bhi nahi tha us class me)
Cheers to the short but sweet memories!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Hey Chicken!
Kukado Kuuu...
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Tumse baat karne ka apna hi mazaa hai! 
Your clarity of thought, kindness and simplicity is inspiring! 
Thanks for helping my team with the EC software; tum turant maan gaye help karne ko and you helped my team get through with the software! 
I wish ki hum squash continue kar paate...bahut mazaa aata...I hope we'll play another match of squash one day (hopefully tab hume saare rules bhi pata honge!)
Jab bhi kuch bakchod karne ka mann hoga, will surely give you a call!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Ssup?
Had some great memories with you; ARIES and Nanital, Mandakani , late nights at the Observatory, Nightout at astro club, Takneek, the night you fell asleep on the terrace in Hall 12 after the observation session, all the other times when you fell asleep ;) and much more...
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

Shivansh : The managers have unanimously decided that I shall be the next CEO.

üòÇüòÇüòÇ
author: Shivansh  Tripathi

text:
Tumhaari adaa hi niraali hai... Mr. and Ms. Antaragni me bina participate kiye hi dono baar audience ka dil jeet liya!

Hall12PL me commentry se lekar Mess me conversations tak...tumhe sunne ka mazaa hi kuch aur hai!

Aise hi bakchodi karte raho!
author: Shivansh  Tripathi
